name: Alakajam 5: Burn The Witch
description:
Incomplete alakajam 5 entry for the theme 'Spellcasting'

Controls:

  • Aim with mouse
  • WASD  to move your character
  • Tap space to cast a melee spell
  • Hold space to charge a burst melee spell
  • Left click to cast magic bullets
  • Hold right click to charge and aim magic missiles
  • Double tap a direction to dash

Only the first arena is included in this version and it never ends. There's also no audio :(
